## About COUSIN


The **COUSIN Project** (EU Horizon research) focuses on:

- Managing and integrating large biological datasets.  

- Building reproducible data pipelines.  

- Supporting advanced machine learning methods such as **dimensionality reduction** and **similarity search**.  

This workshop website is part of **WP5 (Infrastructure & Data Management)** and is maintained to provide high-quality resources for the research community.
